title: How to tell if someone is tracking my text messages on my cell phone - Quora

response.answer_text: haha, I have this problem. i do love a raging paranoia. I notice that my messages change, numbers that I have called wont be there, websites I never searched will be under history, there is a “parent/ child node” reference in the coding of the phone, contact names will change from “Name” to “_________”, whole message sections will disappear, I save all my messages, so when I have a conversation with a female over “her talking to my mother and about my mother lying to her”, and then I realize that she was talking about her boyfriends mother, but stay close to the text as if she was really talking to me. She would come over and say she loved me, (as a friend though), but loud enough so the pervert neighbors that were listening could hear and record it for some odd reason like; trying to make it seem like she was my grilfriend, with the texts, and to the neighbors, when she was a “friend” trying to steal money from the government and blame me. Those texts, the one about my mother, disappeared. GONE! This is my psychosis, and it is not drug induced. It is because I never went to jury duty….shhhh tell no one, or i keeeeel you! Is your paranoia like my paranoia? If so, we should totally swap anecdotes. I have a great noid about my mail being stolen….if youre interested…OK-bYe weeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee….
